commit message:
Merge pull request #207 from jpeitz/german_translation_update

German translation update
look for local artwork before Last.fm
display and cache album art from any source in the artist's album listing

Merge pull request #212 from mafrosis/cover-art

Display and cache album art from any source in the artist's album listing
local covers: musicPath can be http://host:port/path again

Merge pull request #214 from DrVanScott/master

fix for regression of #132: musicPath can be http://host:port/path again
Began support for tablet UI disabling (refs #213)
Added option for disabling Tablet UI (fixes #213)
Fix queue search box focus popping keyboard (fixes #209)
changed BrowseFragment to inherit from SherlockFragment, not SherlockListFragment
update SearchActivity to not use ListActivity
removed unneeded MPDApplication objects; they're inherited from BrowseFragment
removed unneeded extra call to UpdateList in PlaylistsFragment
display cache disk usage in settings
removed methods which just call super
fix exception caused by missing album info in LastFMCover
refactored all fragments to use AlbumCoverDownloadListener
album artwork grid view in library
created (another) setting to enable the album art grid listing

Merge pull request #220 from mafrosis/fragment-refactors

Fragment refactors (part one)

Merge pull request #221 from mafrosis/album-grid

Album grid (part two)
implemented ViewHolder pattern for library lists

Merge pull request #227 from mafrosis/list-optimise1

List optimise 1
Possibly fixed threading issues. Needs a lot of testing, especially on crappy devices.
MPDroid's service should not start if it's not in streaming mode
Merging first batch of patches by Craig Drummond (TuneIn urls support and a bugfix about streams)
Second Craig patches : Stream downloading from server

Third Craig patchset : Cache bugfixes

They seem to happen when there is no sdcard. I have not noticed these problems myself.
Fixed force close on headset unplug
Refactored the data binders, since they are responsible for covert art downloading
The playlist list item is now renamed for compatibility
Downloaded cover art is kept temporarily in high resolution for cache saving.
Fixed volume buttons while in streaming mode (Fixes #226)
Fixed a case where an API 11+ api was used where it should not have been (Fixes #246)
Fix some regressions while removing compat
Removing support for pre API 15, part 2
Updated manifest according to Google's recommendation

Preparation for ActionBarsherlock removal : PopupMenu is now native.

IcsPopupMenu was never meant to be used outside ABS anyway
Fixed cover art downloading too many at once. Need to figure out something
Card UI and refined playlist menu button
Supposedly fixed the headphone removal bug *sigh*
SimpleLibrary now opens the Album Grid when needed
Fixed cover displaying bug in queue

- Add display audio properties (codec, bitrate, sample size, sample frequency) with configuration do enable it
- Add display album year and configuration to enable it
- Add widget with stop button
- Robustness fix for streams with empty tags

Add a playlist action to crop playlist (remove all but selected songs in the playlist)

Add crop icon and let the delete icon to its original place (at the right of the screen)
Fix #62 : Playlist names are not sorted alphabetically

Improve the search result text formatting like this :
ARTIST
ALBUM - ARTIST
TITLE - ALBUM - ARTIST

Merge pull request #269 from jcnoir/pull_request_fix

More audio properties
Fix #62
Better search result

Thanks jcnoir !
